[[File:Image oedema.png|vignette|Œdema of the lower limbs with bucket]]

question.question: What is a common sign of oedema due to fluid retention?
question.option_a: Swelling of the face and upper limbs
question.option_b: Swelling of the lower limbs due to lymphatic obstruction
question.option_c: The appearance of a 'bucket handle' sign on X-ray
question.option_d: Redness and warmth of the affected area
